column4: Hi, I just added to repository the deb link for skype but installed only ver. 1.4 How to install latest beta version that offers video?
Nobody is using skype on ubuntu?
go to http://www.skype.com/intl/en/download/skype/linux/beta/ to get the video beta
thank you
hmmm is my xchat working?
Is there a how to or something that tells me how to install it once I downloaded it? Do I first have to uninstall what I currently synaptic has installed?
So, I can use both the beta and the regular skype, correct?
thks
latest version, just installed yesterday
the beta does work on 7.10, just use the 7.04 link
I have downloaded it and am installing it as of now.
thank you I was not aware it was so easy to install it.
I have installed it and it works fine. Thank you
Can you advice me a place where I can find some docs for learning more about ubuntu and how to tun it? Can I use www.gnome-look.org/ for making ubuntu nicer?

Yes, i guess
So you have like minimising effects and fading etc?
